name: Desserts and Deep Talks
description: Your kind of people are a lot closer to home than you might think. Come for the dessert, stay for the deep talks!

name: Bonfire and S'mores
description: Summer is almost over! Don't miss out on fireside chats that will warm your soul in one of Toronto's hidden gems. We have vegan marshmallows!

name: Board Game Night
description: You're invited to a board game night at Snakes and Lattes! What better way to make friends for a good time, not a long time than a competitive game of UNO? Board game aficionados and noobs welcome!

name: Meet and Eat
description: If the smell of freshly baked Afghan naan and juicy kabob has you salivating, this is the event for you! A great opportunity to enjoy Middle Eastern cuisine and make lasting connections.
